item.title: Total Edutainment Forever
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: Forcing education and entertainment together is a great way to ensure you donâ€™t really do either all that well. (Case in point: The Jack Hanna repeat wasteland, targeted toward young teens as part of an advertising loophole, that is FCC-mandated educational television on broadcast stations.) Games are no exception. In the infancy of computers, educators quickly figured out that computer games could be a great vessel for both education and entertainment.
